import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductWarehouse } from 'src/app/models/productWarehouse.model'; import { WarehouseService } from 'src/app/services/warehouse.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reports', templateUrl: './reports.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reports.component.css'] }) export class ReportsComponent implements OnInit { reports: ProductWarehouse[] = []; constructor(private warehouseService: WarehouseService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.warehouseService.getReports() .subscribe({ next: (reports) => { this.reports = reports; }, error: (response) => { console.log(response); } }); } }
